kpi.name: M8023C9

kpi_info.title: PDCP SDU data volume on eUu Interface DL for UEs assigned to QCI Counter Group 4
kpi_info.use: The measurement gives an indication of the eUu interface traffic load by reporting the total transmitted PDCP SDU-related traffic volume for all UEs assigned to QCI Counter Group 4. UPDATED: This counter is updated when a PDCP SDU is transmitted towards a UE assigned to QCI Counter Group 4.

kpi.kpi_alias: PDCP SDU data volume on eUu Interface DL for UEs assigned to QCI Counter Group 4
